#nametype [nametype]: 126
The Spider Clan is possibly the smallest of the clans, and they are rarely found outside the Forest of Spider. They are shorter than most Machakans and use wits and malice to achieve their ends. Influenced by Spider, the warriors of the clan use spears dipped in poison made by their witch doctors.
